name: Space Battlecruiser
description: Space Battlecruiser is an arcade style, top down space shooter where you control a heavily armed capital ship. Battle against squadrons of fighters, fleets of warships, heavily defended space stations, and powerful command ships. Learn to master weaponry and special abilities like the Energy Shield.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Memory: 6 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 3 GHz Quad Core Memory: 16 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
